titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the need for free, democratic, transparent, and fair elections in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela without threats or intimidation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/11/2009--Introduced. Calls for free elections in the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela. Condemns the recent actions of Hugo Chavez as detrimental to democracy and a violation of the Charter of the Organization of American States (OAS).
